title: UK Elegant Country Escape near Gerrards Cross & Beaconsfield with Indoor Pool
description: Stride through the picturesque English countryside and uncover the charm of Beaconsfield and Gerrards Cross with a stay at Crowne Plaza Gerrards Cross, an IHG Hotel. From your quiet hideaway, traverse ancient woods, green hills and historic old towns - whatever you choose, each day is a feast for the eyes. For the perfect end to the day's adventures, revel in the cool ambiance of 1269 Restaurant, Bar and Grill and feast on quintessential British cuisine or enjoy a dip in the indoor pool.
location_description: Crowne Plaza Gerrards Cross, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: Oxford Road, Beaconsfield HP9 2XE, United Kingdom
